content: pebble ridge is a crochet placemat pattern it features a simple yet satisfying reversible stitch for the body combined with a fun and interesting border stitch this project is perfect for gift giving travel stitching or adding just the right touch to your table or desk color a 100g/186yds 170m mint color b 60g/112yds 102m white written for a two-color version experimentation with monochromatic or multi-color versions is encouraged finished size 19 48cm x 15 38cm mercerized cotton is recommended for this pattern to achieve the listed gauge and finished size this pattern has been tech edited and tested happy crocheting
